title: Update app name to Shake.com

requirements.text: Update the browser tab title and all HTML meta tags (including Apple mobile web app title) to use 'Shake.com' instead of the current app name.

quotes: I want this name Shake. Com

acceptanceCriteria: The browser tab displays 'Shake.com' as the page title
Apple mobile web app meta tag name is updated to 'Shake.com'

requirements.text: Update the PWA manifest (frontend/public/manifest.json) so that 'name' and 'short_name' fields are both set to 'Shake.com'.

quotes: I want this name Shake. Com

acceptanceCriteria: When installed as a PWA, the home screen icon label reads 'Shake.com'

requirements.text: Update all visible logo text, app name labels, and header/sidebar branding throughout the frontend UI to display 'Shake.com' instead of the previous app name ('Wrapper AI').

quotes: I want this name Shake. Com

acceptanceCriteria: No instance of 'Wrapper AI' remains visible in the UI
The login screen (if it shows an app name) displays 'Shake.com'
